snippet.title: Forgotten Passages Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1120940/Forgotten_Passages/

Follow a girl and a mysterious bird through the wormholes of an eclectic universe.

+ 100 Tiny Levels +
Stumble down a surreal rabbit hole and explore an atmospheric world composed of one hundred visually rich dreamscapes.

+ A Micro Adventure +
This journey takes about one hour to play.
A fast playthrough takes approximately 50 minutes.
( Plan for longer gameplay times if you stop and smell the roses
or search for secret items )

+ Simple Gameplay +
Collect the glowing feathers in each level to unlock the portal to the next area.

A zen like experience designed to be played in a dark room with headphones.

Coming January 2020
If you are interested in this game, wishlist it on steam!  https://store.steampowered.com/app/1120940/Forgotten_Passages/

Check out the Forgotten Passages website at www.ForgottenPassages.com
